review:
My name is Noemi, I am from Spain and have been living in Bangalore for the last 2 years. I always wait for my holidays in Spain to meet my family dentist and do the annual review.  

A month ago I started to feel pain in one of my left molars. I was so scared to meet another dentist so I just took some medication in hope to solve the problem. The pain continued and finaly a friend told me about Dr Ganesh.

In the beggining I was very skeptical but now I am glad to have met him. After the checking, he calmly explained what was the problem and the steps to solve it. He is a great professional and I highly recommend him to anyone (specialy if you are looking for high standards). It gave me the confidence that all will go well. And it went perfectly well. I am so happy to have a dentist in Bangalore whom I can trust. 

The clinic and all the team follow all the precautions to avoid Covid infections.

I can only thank Dr. Ganesh and team
